title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
description: When a table report item is added without setting the data set, the group dialog should still be shown. However, currently, the group dialog is not shown when the data set is not set.
OB: Currently, when a table report item is added without setting the data set, the group dialog is not shown.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting the data set, the group dialog should be shown as expected.
SR:
1. Create a new report.
2. Add a table report item without setting the data set.
3. Try to create a new table group. The group dialog should be shown.
